mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Members(Email, LastName, FirstName, FullName, Password, Birthday, PersonalURI, IsApproved, IsLockedOut, IsDomranted, IsDropedOut, CreateDate, CertificationText) VALUES(#{email}, #{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{fullName}, #{password}, #{birthday}, #{personalURI}, #{isApproved}, #{isLockedOut}, #{isDomranted}, #{isDropedOut}, SYSDATE, #{certificationText})
